mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company(cp_id, pwd, admin_name, admin_phone, cp_name, cp_num, cp_phone, fax_num, cp_address , cp_email) VALUES(#{cp_id}, #{pwd}, #{admin_name}, #{admin_phone}, #{cp_name}, #{cp_num}, #{cp_phone}, #{fax_num}, #{cp_address}, #{cp_email})
mapper.select: SELECT pwd FROM company WHERE cp_id = #{cp_id}

SELECT cp_id, cp_address, dropyn, cp_name, cp_phone, admin_name, admin_phone FROM (SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY cp_name desc) rn,cp_name, cp_id, cp_address, dropyn, cp_phone, admin_name, admin_phone FROM company WHERE cp_name LIKE '%'||#{keyName}||'%' AND cp_id LIKE '%'||#{keyId}||'%') WHERE rn > (#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} AND rn <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.rowsPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company WHERE cp_id LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%'
